page.title: 13Sparkwell Cubs.
page.content: Cubs is for boys between the ages of eight and eleven. We wear a uniform which is a dark green jumper, a green and yellow tie and cap. To become a member you must know the Cub Law and Promise, all the animals in the first chapter of the Jungle Book and the Grand Howl. The Law is:- A cub scout should always do his best, think of others before himself and do a good turn every day. The Promise is:- I promise that I will do my best to do my duty to God and to the Queen, to help other people and to keep the Cub Scout Law. At cubs we play games, make things and have homework every week. The activities go towards your awards - bronze, silver and gold arrows. You can also win red proficiency badges. Duncan Spencer.
